StageAttention: The one who craved sacrifice most lived on—he walks across the bridge made of his companions' bones, their will carved into his skin. Alone, he reaches a new era. For the future he dreams of, he will not back down.
Vonnegut summons a Cube and hurls it at the target.
Vonnegut summons a large number of Lightswords from the ground and attacks by creating square columns under its targets. Can be countered with a Parry.
Vonnegut summons a large number of Lightswords from the Void and attacks its targets with a Dualblade Slash. Can be countered with a Parry.

Even now, she still haunts the ethereal mirage of Misono High, driven by an insatiable desire to "steal fire." All alone, she spins elaborate fantasies to escape the harsh realities of life.

Guardian of the Delorean starship, modified from Nanami's companion, Power, with a design inspired by the golden age movie "Oceanic Rim".
Powered attacks the target three times in succession.

Powered spins and slashes the target, then charges forward upon landing. A perfectly timed dodge according to the prompt will not trigger the Matrix, but will cause Powered to stagger for a few seconds, allowing for a follow-up attack to knock it down.
Powered fires a continuous laser beam from its eyes, then leaps into the air and slams into the target.

Powered charges on the spot, releasing an electromagnetic pulse. Upon hitting the target, it will be stunned and knocked back. In the second stage, if it hits the target, it will execute the target.
After firing a random laser barrage with its dorsal fins, Powered charges forward in a spinning attack.
Powered unleashes a series of powerful attacks using its claws and drill, which can be countered with consecutive parries.
Powered charges up and unleashes an atomic breath, dealing massive AOE damage.

Powered spins and slashes the target, then charges forward upon landing. A perfectly timed dodge according to the prompt will not trigger the Matrix, but will cause Powered to stagger for a few seconds, allowing for a follow-up attack to knock it down.
When Powered's HP drops below a certain threshold, it will enter a berserk state, launching frenzied attacks and countering the player's Matrix. Multiple dodges are required to counter it.
